Detailed Description

The mask and value pair which identifies a physical trigger.

Usually ther physical trigger is identified by one bit in the trigger word (or input enable mask for the configuration). The physical trigger bits will not be export but the logical trigger to which the physical trigger is assigned.

See also:
TriggerDef_t

Compare two trigger values.

Needed, since the TriggerValue_t is used as a key for the trigger definition map.
